mapper.select: select t_wastescategory.name as categoryName, t_wasteslist.industry, t_wasteslist.code, t_wasteslist.description, t_wastescharacter.name as characterName from t_wasteslist join t_wastescategory, t_wastescharacter where t_wasteslist.category=t_wastescategory.code and t_wasteslist.wastesCharacter=t_wastescharacter.code;
